title: Investigate Manufacturing Deviation
description: A production supervisor discovers a deviation during a manufacturing process (e.g., an equipment failure) and must open an investigation.

tasks.description: Document the initial details of the deviation in the quality management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new deviation record, describing the event, time, and batch affected.

tasks.description: Perform an initial risk assessment to determine the potential impact on product quality.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assesses the risk as 'High' due to potential product contamination.

tasks.description: Assemble a cross-functional team (Manufacturing, QA, Engineering) to investigate the root cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and assigns investigation tasks to the appropriate team members.

tasks.description: Document the root cause (e.g., 'failed pump seal') and create a CAPA plan to prevent recurrence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the deviation record with the root cause and links it to a new CAPA.
